name: Enrik
description: a scarred man with a gap-toothed grin and large, calloused hands.

172: "Right. You been here before." He studies you carefully.
"Hey, what's it look like, I'm a mind reader?"
"Come by my shop when I'm open!"
"Come by my shop when I'm open!"
"Come by my shop when I'm open!"
"And my mutter said I was thick."
"You can @buy's arms from me or @sell me yer used stuff."
"@Enrik. Enrik the @Hammer's what I'm known as 'round here."
"They call me that 'cause I's got a good @left."
"Keep it up and I'll show ya," he growls.
He gives you a blank stare.
921: "Sorry, none of you's got anything I need."
"Done!" $N hands $Y #7 gold pieces and takes the $0.
1829: and(integer(value 9), notEquals(data(dword 2461, plus(integer(value 9), minus(integer(value 0), byte 1))), byte 0))
2223: less(plus(canCarry(integer(value 3)), weight(byte 88, integer(value 1))), weight(data(dword 2461, integer(value 0)), byte 1))

"Good!"

After accepting $Y's gold, $N hands over the $1.
